section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains information about autopsy of cancer related death.

stentry.p: Indicates a code (if known) whether a post-mortem examination was performed on the patient. Possible values are Patient alive; Autopsy performed; No autopsy performed; Patient expired, unknown if autopsy per formed; etc.
The date and time of autopsy.
The autopsy sequence number, usually stated as A-90-XXXX.
